def_en: If a way of doing something is convenient, it is easy, or very useful or suitable for a particular purpose.

def_cn: 附近的;方便到达的;近便的
def_en: If you describe a place as convenient, you are pleased because it is near to where you are, or because you can reach another place from there quickly and easily.

def_cn: (时间)方便的，合适的，合宜的
def_en: A convenient time to do something, for example to meet someone, is a time when you are free to do it or would like to do it.

def_cn: (态度、行为等)方便的，省力的，省事的
def_en: If you describe someone's attitudes or actions as convenient, you think they are only adopting those attitudes or performing those actions in order to avoid something difficult or unpleasant.
